My TLDR of "Crossing the Enterprise Chasm":

- Everyone needs to add enterprise features eventually
- It's complicated and boring
- They all want the same things (enterpriseready.io)

So let @WorkOS do it and maintain it: workos.com/blog/crossing-â€¦ https://t.co/jsEcvmXd1T

content.value:
As companies prepare for a new economic environment 

I highly encourage startups to start layering in new revenue streams and land larger customers sooner 

In this talk @grinich shares tactically how to move into enterprise as an early stage, product-led company:
